alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Madison; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 6:33AM CST until January 12 at 7:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 AM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN EAST CARROLL...NORTHWESTERN MADISON...NORTHEASTERN RICHLAND AND SOUTH CENTRAL WEST CARROLL PARISHES... At 633 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Delhi, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Delhi, Epps, Monticello, Warden, Waverly, and Tendal around 640 AM CST. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for northeastern Louisiana. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: East Carroll; Madison; Richland; West Carroll
